website_summaries.verdict: A tough boot made for extreme temperatures. Easy to use Velcro strap.
pros: Excellent insulation works in below zero temperatures
Velcro strap keeps the foot in place
cons: They run small, so measure your child's feet carefully
It may be difficult to find the size you need

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for size/fit only. It’s still summer here, but I knew I needed a new pair of snow boots and didn’t want to wait until the last minute. Anyway, I am an adult, but can wear kids size 4 shoes. I ordered these in a kids 5, figuring I would probably want to wear heavy socks with them. Glad I ordered a size up because they seem to run a bit small. I agree with other reviewers that the fit is a little tight around the ankle area. But overall, they seem like they are comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.author: BRM

customer_reviews.title: Durable & dependable in cold WI winter!
customer_reviews.text: Kamik makes great quality winter boots. I have purchased this brand for years for my children and they never disappoint. So durable that they remain in good quality has hand-me-downs, too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in black for my son. There was nothing on the boots or packaging that indicated it was for girls; it said 'youth size 5.' Like all Kamik boots we have had, these are high quality and durable. My son's feet were warm when his siblings were complaining of cold toes. I believe the temp rating label on the boot said -45 degrees F.
customer_reviews.author: lilmamaof7

customer_reviews.title: Durable, warm and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These have always been a good boot for my growing children. Keeps them dry and warm. Removable/replaceable liner is a good bonus. The more agessive soles are great for playing outside on playground, in backyard or in icy parking lots. Easy for kids of all ages to slip into and out of compared to other good name brands that are slim fit (in calf and foot). Other good name brands are also heavier which makes kids tend to complain more as they get tired. Recommend getting size up, that way can wear thick socks or extend the use of the boot into the next season perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, but great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome in that they're warm and dry. They're going to work perfectly for our son for those purposes. The one star dock is simply because they're very narrow in my opinion. I'd say my son has average width feet, and with a thin pair of socks they're very tight on the sides. However the length is about perfect, as expected. We'll keep them and hope they stretch out a little, or he doesn't need to wear very heavy socks ;) Overall the boot quality though is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm with room to grow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Son last year and they are totally waterproof, comfortable and fit him beautifully with room to grow. My Son has a wide foot and these were super comfortable and easy to slip on and off and kept him very warm during the NJ Winters and the snow. He will probably be able to use these next Winter without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Vick428

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are good boots- the one drawback is they get a bit narrow around the area where the strap is to tighten them, so even when the strap is I tightened you really have to stick your fingers way down to get them wide enough for a kid’s foot. They did get easier to put on over time, or maybe we just figured out the system. Other than that, great boots. They kept the water out- no one complained about cold toes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy boots. Do as promised. Go at least one size up!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to withstand snow and low temperatures. Waterproof. Kept their feet dry and warm. The kids complained about it being too tight, although I had already gone a size up (as recommended in other reviews). I think it has something to do with the thick lining (see in the pictures) which is precisely what keeps their feet warm). As someone mentioned here, you can take it out, but with it would go all the insulation as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Raad

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yo son wore out his last Kamik snowboots in Size 5 after wearing them all winter for 5 months (we live in a Colorado ski town). So I ordered these is Size 6 thinking he could wear them another 6 months, but this style or new footbed was too narrow even though it was a full size larger. Sad, because we liked the color. The description on Amazon just says Kids boots, not Girls Boots, but I'm wondering if that was the width difference?? Anyway, sent these back and ordered Tundra snow boots in Size 6 instead and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric insert is way too small
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been having a difficult time finding boots for my 10-year-old son. These boots measure the same when held up to his tennis shoes, but the fabric insert is way, way smaller and he could barely even get his foot in. It’s almost like the fabric insert was at least a half size smaller than the actual boot itself. if you could fit your foot inside the fabric insert, there would be a lot of empty space between the end of it and the boot. These seem to have been designed poorly. We had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi German

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th year I have purchased Kamik boots for my son. They fit to size and keep his feet warm. This style it different from the previous style I purchased when he wore a 10 or smaller as he was able to open the other ones up easily to get his feet in. So far so good with this style now that he is 5 years old. I ordered an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie Patrin

customer_reviews.title: Great kid snow boot-all genders
customer_reviews.text: Best kids boots! I bought the black for my son and he has worn them all winter (and it’s still snowing). He gets stinky feet so I just remove the liners, wash in the washer, air dry and he’s good to go. Only complaint he has is the bottom of his foot gets the little pilly balls and he likes to rip them out. I fear eventually he’ll rip the liner! 10 year old boy size 4.
customer_reviews.author: JulesAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great snowboots
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the item description says "girls" in the shopping cart. These are definitely unisex boots. I bought them for my 10 yo son. He wears a size 6 shoe, and the size 6 boots fit great with room to grow. Kamik boots are great quality. I've been buying them for years. I have one pair that all 3 of my boys have worn, and they are still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: McFamily

customer_reviews.title: These snow bootys were a GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son not realizing they were girls snowboots..but since they were black it didn't matter. They fit him perfectly. He wears a size 5.5 show and I ordered the 5.5's in these and they were a great fit. They kept his feet warm and dry while on a recent trip to the mountains where they had just had a snow storm. These worked out great. I recommend them 100% to anyone. I will probably come back to these same ones here on Amazon when it's time to move him up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. As far as I know they fit as expected. I ordered one size up simply to extend them into next winter as well as it's easy to double up socks if needed. She's played in the snow a few different times in these and they've kept her feet warm and dry. They are easy to put on and off and cinch easily. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: homemakingmama

customer_reviews.title: These are the fourth winter Kamik boots we bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the fourth winter Kamik boots we bought for my son. And this is the only pair which make he has his feet wet every time after a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: My feet stayed warm and dry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and they were too small. Nicely enough, they fit me! So I kept them. My feet are always cold in the winter but these boots kept them warm and I was able to play outside with my kids for about 2 hours and stay comfortably warm. This never happens so I'm giving these boots two enthusiastic thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: She can walk in them fine, no tripping
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter wears size 8 shoe. I ordered a 10 because of the liner. They fit her, a little extra room for another pair of socks. They might fit next year, you never know how much a child's foot is going to grow. She can walk in them fine, no tripping.
customer_reviews.author: p  klein

customer_reviews.title: Great warm snow boots for the serious sledder.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a good price. My son says they are comfortable and never complains about cold toes. They are waterproof all the way up and you can use the string on top to keep snow out. IF you do get the insides wet, the liner is removeable to dry. And with older boys, the ability to air it out is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size bigger for both of my kids considering the snow socks that would go inside, they are super amazing quality and it comes w a removable insole, easy to put in and out for my 4yr, for my 2 yr still working on that... but over all super satisfied
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made and the fit is great, but they are definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be well made and the fit is great, but they are definitely not waterproof. Our daughter manages to get her feet soaking wet playing in heavy snow and slush.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe these boots! My 7-year old came home from school on the first day of wearing them during recess (in the snow) and the liners along the sole of his feet were soaked! I’m so upset after spending a good chunk of money on what I thought were water proof boots.
customer_reviews.author: CRamon

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids had this brand before and it worked out well so I ordered them again, based on our prior experience. They fit well, keep their feet warm, and come up high enough to keep the rain/snow out. My grandson wore them for a season, turned them over to his sister for another season and now she’s outgrown them hence we have re-ordered
customer_reviews.author: JTNac

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry and easy boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair die for my son, love these boots! Warm, dry and easy to put on and take off. Love the height too when using in deep snow.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barba

customer_reviews.title: Finally a boot that doesn't come home with a wet inside
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Seem to be holding up to an active 7 year old in a Wisconsin winter. It's been in deep puddles with spring thaw, piles of snow and slush. The boots do not come home with wet liners thankfully, the outside surface may be wet, but doesn't seem to affect the inside. Appreciate that feature for a kids boot. Also so far happy that the liner has not worn out as they always seem to do. My child is also pleased with non-wet feet after recess. Would consider again when the feet grow.
customer_reviews.author: TheMamaTangerine

customer_reviews.title: Two left feet
customer_reviews.text: We received the boots before a ski trip and while away, I kept asking my son if he had his boots on the right feet. Come to find out while away and trying to wear them, the company made a boot with two left feet. It was somewhat difficult to tell just looking at them but come to find out, they were defective. The fabric of the boot that went up his leg was sewn on another left boot. Needless to say, they have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Feet Nice and Dry!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the size 6 and size 7 US Big Kids' boots to see which was better. I usually wear a women's 7 or 7 W, but in boys' shoes, a size 5.5. The size 6 boots are a little bit snug with bulky socks on, but the size 7 was too big, and my foot slid around. Went with the size 6, and wore them for a hike in the forest recently. I think the inner pad in the smaller size will mold nicely to my feet after a few wearings.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Love this make of boot....they last and last (each pair last long enough to be pasted to all three of my children) and keep feet warm and dry through a Wisconsin winter! Could improve their look....lacking in style and good looks, but hardworking
customer_reviews.author: C.D

customer_reviews.title: Great kids winter boot
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my kid to put on himself. Removable liners are a nice bonus. Good quality materials as always with Kamik. This is the 4th or 5th pair we’ve bought for our son through the years and are never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are the kid boots I keep coming back to. Waterproof, warm, traction and they’ve worked in Alaska and Wyoming. Spendy for us, but they have lasted through 4 pairs of boy feet. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love Kamik brand of snow boots
customer_reviews.text: We love Kamik brand of snow boots. My oldest son needed new ones this year and we got these. They are well made and look nice. My youngest son is wearing the Kamik ones my oldest had when he was about 6 or 7 yrs old and they have lots of life left in them.
customer_reviews.author: snowprincess84

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for Winter
customer_reviews.text: Great kid boots for a MN winter. I have had two kids in these for two years, they never complain of cold feet. They play outside for recess almost every day here, and usually after school too. Lots of time in temps between 0 and 30F.
customer_reviews.author: talBOT

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough about these boots and this brand. Great fit and my daughter did not even complain once when we were in New Hampshire in - 10-degree weather. She loves these so much she wears them anytime there is a hint of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Carlye Pina

customer_reviews.title: Kept my sons feet dry and warm in the snow
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy to have it in the closet when the first snowfall hit early in November. Kids spent the whole day outside wearing their boots and playing.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2nd grade grand-daughter and a pair of pink ones for my 1st grade grand-daughter. They are easy off and on and the toggle closure at the top cinches them in simply and without the need for tying any laces. These are excellent quality boots, very warm, and will keep their feet cozy and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: These are great toddler snow boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great toddler snow boots. Fit true to see, easy on and off and a handy pull tab at the top to tighten the boot around the leg to decrease the amount of whining you might here if snow or ice were to accidentally find it's way down the boot!
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter said that the boots squeezed her feet. The liner made her feel uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Wright

customer_reviews.title: So far best boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th type of winter boot I have tried for my kids, and so far these have been the best. They were recommended to me by a friend and she said this is the only kind she buys for her kids, so I thought I would give it a try. My kids seem to really like them. Comfortable and warm. Going forward this is the brand I intend to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Too small/ narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size up (10) for my 4yo and they were too small, I think it was mostly the width. In desperation of up coming snow I bought her a pair of second hand sorel boots (9) and they fit perfect. But they seemed like really nice boots otherwise
customer_reviews.author: juniper

customer_reviews.title: SHOULD BE UNISEX
customer_reviews.text: I liked the boot very much , except it says Girl boot, and really should be advertised as Unisex, as my 10 year old grandson is the one that they were purchased for, nothing that suggest it is a "GIRL" THING.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is completely wrong!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were absolutely too small! Not just a little but 2 sizes smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetbabs

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Kid's feet are always warm and dry. Liners are removable but never had to take them out. We ALWAYS buy Kamik boots for our Minnesota winters.
customer_reviews.author: jen_jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson who lives in VT. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. No issues with the cold weather or snow. I’d purchase more when my boys need a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, warm, dry
customer_reviews.text: Good boots. Easy to get on and off. Warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: uberlink

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Warm and waterproof! Kamik always a good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots My daughter loves them too 😊 These boots are super warm and have a removable insulated inside so u can wash them or dry when they get wet inside (my favorite part). The colors are pretty and I totally would buy them again. These are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Kamik boots are the best kids boot for a reasonable price. East to take off and on. They stand up to Buffalo winters.
customer_reviews.author: Aklukuk

customer_reviews.title: True size
customer_reviews.text: Great for snow and just the NY cold weather - insulation can be removed and you have a rain and cold boot. color is prettier than the picture
customer_reviews.author: tabita wilson

customer_reviews.title: Kamik boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect snow boots! We live where there is snow flon the ground for at least 6 months every year. Good snow boots are very important. These are perfect and keep feet dry and warm. They are worn everyday and are very durable as well! Love Kamik!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots! Drawstring too helps keep the snow from going in their boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E. Visser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have these for my boys, they are the only boots that can last several seasons and still be passed down to younger brothers. Many other brands fall apart with one season. My boys wear them most every day in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better than a good warm pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than a good warm pair of boots. Fits as expected. Keeps the feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots that kept our sons feet toasty and warm while out playing in the snow in the Cascade mountains. They fit true to size, keep the wet and cold out and aren’t too heavy. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good and very comfortable as my 4 years voy told me.
customer_reviews.author: Conrado

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these!!!! So far they have been keeping his feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Order these same boots for years different sizes. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Katya from Utah

customer_reviews.title: My son measures at 2.5, but the 3 was snug so we returned it, and ordered the 4.
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stays on but leaves room to grow. I ordered this boot for both my boys and they are absolutely in love with the comfort of the insert, and the ease of putting these on, and the warmth. They are withstanding the Mountain snow well in their first week.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - Our favorite boot!
customer_reviews.text: Kamiks are our go-to boot of choice. 5 out of 6 of our kids have them, and when the littlest is big enough next year, she will have them too! They hold up extremely well and have been easy to hand down to our children.
customer_reviews.author: Shannaherx8

customer_reviews.title: Wicked warm and dry boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pairs, 1 for each of my grandkids we had our first snow fall the past 3 days and let me tell you their feet stay toasty warm and dry in these boots.....if you child has a wide foot order a size or 2 larger and thick winter socks so they fit all winter long and into soggy muddy spring thaw!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the little ones to put on
customer_reviews.text: Kamik seems to run a little big but don’t get a smaller size then planned. Wool socks offset that difference. So far good, easy for the kids to put on themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cerkoney

customer_reviews.title: Kamik makes the best boots!
customer_reviews.text: These say girls but they are boys. He loves them, they keep his feet dry and warm. This is our second pair and I will continue buying Kamik!
customer_reviews.author: Monica92908

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots this is third pair I have bought for Kids Easy on and off for younger kids plenty warm for a day out in snow
customer_reviews.author: scott ferris

customer_reviews.title: great kid boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband only buys our kids kamiks in the winter because they live up to their reputation and seem to last forever....handed down through many children.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Warm, Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wore these through a Maine winter this year and they worked fantastic. They're still in fantastic condition so we plan to hand them down to our younger son, as we bought gender neutral black for this reason. Very excited over their quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole R Champ

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves them. They are solid and warm for Minnesota winters.
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnap

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got 13size for my 5years old son! Little large but i hope this will fits with thick winter socks!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson who is really picky and he LOVED them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet warm & dry
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot that keeps my kids feet warm and dry!!! The only brand of boots we’ve ever purchased for our kids. They last multiple seasons and can be passed down to younger children.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & Stay warm!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and keep my daughters feet warm. She says she wished they were softer on the inside but overall they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Kylah K.

customer_reviews.title: Best snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: We buy these boots every year. They are incredibly warm, functional and durable. A bit like Patagonia products, we can always count on handing these down to our younger child when our older son outgrows them. Love Kamik!
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, no break-in time, waterproof. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Emily Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Tho they are bigger than anticipated I love them. Gonna save for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: These are narrow at first, but they do stretch out. Absolute ONLY boot ice found that does.not.leak.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Karaba

customer_reviews.title: very warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought it like new boots, but came without labels and without a box.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot she loves them and priced right. Came earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My puddle loving, snow pile stomping 2 year old lives in these!
customer_reviews.author: K Sigurjons

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boots
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't worn them yet in the snow but so far so good. They're warm and they keep his feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Doritza Monzon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot! My daughter’s Kindergarten class spends an entire day out in the school forest rain/shine/snow/cold and these have kept her feet very warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic coat! Fits as expected, durable, warm. Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kids winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very durable, reasonably warm, easy to take care of, and my daughter just loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! My son had no complaints whatsoever of cold feet while being in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Coast Girl

customer_reviews.title: Practical and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old. Easy to slip on and off as she goes to school/out for recess. Keeps her toes warm and the snow out!
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my kids. Love that the liner is removable for faster more thorough drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Harthan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy kids boots!
customer_reviews.text: Solid sturdy kids boots for very reasonable price. Comfy fit. Easy to put on. We only buy Kamik! They last!
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Durable Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Fit perfectly and has lasted well beyond the winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots!
customer_reviews.text: Best boots out there. This is our 5th pair! Durable, warm and water proof.
customer_reviews.author: jt011080

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My growing daughter gets a new pair every winter for the past 5 years! Love the insulation and drawstring top to keep out snow.
customer_reviews.author: beems

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for each of my kids. They kept their socks drys. I ordered a size bigger to leave room for thick socks. Fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these boots for my daughter for years. They’re super warm and never wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann Crimin

customer_reviews.title: Fits as suggested.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Fit perfect and worked well for him to play in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. We live on a mountain in Wyoming and my boy has no complaints about his feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: they kept my grandsons feet dry and warm. Very nice affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boot
customer_reviews.text: Great snow boot. My son is 9 and trust me when I say he wears out his shoes. These boots keep his feet dry and warm in our deep snow and freezing temps here in Idaho.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Boots are amazing. Warm and have great construction
customer_reviews.text: Boots are amazing. Warm and have great construction. This is our second pair as the kids of grown. Quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy V

customer_reviews.title: My son was very please with them
customer_reviews.text: He used the boots to go snow tubing and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PaulC.

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, his younger brother will be able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, they were too small for the son I bought them for. Fortunately, his younger brother will be able to use next year.
customer_reviews.author: mnmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! My 5 year old is pretty hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Kamik always delivers. Great boots! My 5 year old is pretty hard on his outerwear and these have held up wonderfully and kept his feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha O

customer_reviews.title: bought for my 12 yr old girl. she usually ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 12 yr old girl. she usually wear size 3, but got her a size 4 and theres just enough room to grow in. hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these boots for my kids year after year. Very happy, keeps their feet warm & dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kamik Kids' Waterbug5 Snow Boot
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Shaft measures approximately mid-calf from arch
6 mm Zylex removable liner (97% recycled content) with moisture wicking lining
Adjustable snow collar with Easy Grab Lace Lock
Adjustable midfoot hook and loop strap with easy grip rubber tip
